metadata.title: USN-6358-1 -- RedCloth vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that RedCloth incorrectly handled certain inputs during html sanitisation. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6358-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ruby-redcloth - 4.3.2-4ubuntu0.22.04.1 No subscription required
